archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0910
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when I am cancelling a service, I want my payments to reflect only the period I have the service, so that I am not over charged or charged for services I am no longer using.

properties.value: In what situations in subscription model partial payment should be refunded, how it should be calculated?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
